title: The Infinite Hotel Paradox - Jeff Dekofsky

multiple-choice.question: What is the main concept that the German mathematician David Hilbert used to demonstrate the difficulty of understanding infinity?

options.label: C

multiple-choice.question: How does the night manager of the Infinite Hotel accommodate a new guest when the hotel is already full?

options.label: B
